Albert Desseler

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Deshler
  2. Foster Name: Albert Deshler
  3. Foster Family: Christopher and Bertha Haught
  4. Location of Family: Ord, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Ord, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 4
  8. Date of Birth: 11/12/1902, NY
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: 1930 United States Federal Census; Ord Quiz, 19 July 1906.
